thread.section_title: Mr. Payday Easy Loans Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mr. Payday Easy Loans Inc. | mrpayday.ca
thread.title: Patty S.
thread.title_full: Mr. Payday Easy Loans Inc. reviewed by Patty S.

author: Patty S.
title: Patty S.
text: Ran into a number of issues trying to set up an online loan. Biggest problem was I got my passwords mixed up. Second biggest problem was my bank had records of an account that I had closed 4 years ago. Throughout all the mix-ups the customer service representative remained polite and efficient. She provided excellent service.
